Is at least eighteen (18) years of age;

Has never been convicted of a felony;
Has not been convicted within the last twelve (12) months of a misdemeanor
Is capable of preparing opinions and orders and conducting hearings inciden
Has demonstrated knowledge of the Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Code of Law an

The Tribal Governing Board may also select pro tempore judges as it deems a
